website_summaries.verdict: With efficient asymmetrical teeth, this rotary hammer core bit easily cuts through materials as tough as brick, stucco, and concrete block.
pros: Asymmetrical teeth will cut faster and last longer
All-in-one core transmits power directly to the end of the bit
cons: May take a while to drill through, but it makes very precise cuts

customer_reviews.title: bosch 3 1/4 hammer core bit
customer_reviews.text: this bit will cut threw any concrete. very durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Coltrain

customer_reviews.title: Great core drill for concrete with metal mesh
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, quick cutting, while absorbing most shock and vibration during operation. Made very cleanly-cut and accurately-sized holes through concrete, rocks, and metal mesh wires. Hope it stays nice and sharp for a few hundred holes.
customer_reviews.author: SoFlo Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability and price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bit to drill over 200 holes in a concrete block foundation to fill walls with grout mix for strength. Drilled very quickly, all holes drilled dry and bit held up great and is still in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality for the price! Makes drilling red brick lile a pro. I use it for a/c line set and gas lines.
customer_reviews.author: bmc

customer_reviews.title: Easily bored through a concrete wall to install a dryer ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily bored through a concrete wall to install a dryer vent. Just what I've come to expect from a Bosch product.
customer_reviews.author: brian pollard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good core bit for the money. Have only used once but still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Jarett hart

customer_reviews.title: Great core bits.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bit to add some stub outs for a pre existing concrete foundation. I used them with my Bosch SDS-max drill. They drilled through the concrete effortlessly. The long shanks allowed me to drill all the way through the foundation. Take it, it was not a thick section of the foundation. About 6 inches thick. The bits did not dull cutting though 6 to 10 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Pi+rate

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This cut a hole in my foundation like butter. Only issue for me was that the bit was just slightly too big for my hammer drill so I had to rent a larger one
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use to drill holes thru concrete, block and/ or stucco to install plumbing pipe and Bosch Bits are dependable.Since the shell tightens to the threads of the pilot shank, I use a small amount of heat proof grease on the threads which makes removal of the Speed Core a little easier.I had no trouble turning this bit using my Milwaukee Fuel M-18 Cordless Hammer Drill, just have to take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Bam

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used it to drill through a 2x10 for a dryer vent and through a solid concrete block to install a stove fan vent. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: william m

customer_reviews.title: no bs
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described, makes quick and precise hole. Not just a time saver. hope i was "helpful"
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Easter

customer_reviews.title: If you have or can get the hammer drill.
customer_reviews.text: Cut a clean hole very easily. Had to run a new line set outside for a new condenser. Worth every penny. I borrowed a DeWalt SDS - Max from work. I imagine you could rent one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, good service. Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: it took some consistent pressure as i was drilling laterally (horizontally) but the holes look like they were cut with a laser
customer_reviews.text: bought this bit to drill 4 inch holes through a piece of bluestone 3 inches thick. it took some consistent pressure as i was drilling laterally (horizontally) but the holes look like they were cut with a laser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bit in my SDS Max. Was able to drill several feet worth of holes in cement gravel mix, 2"-3" at a time. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as good quality as any other brand much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and long lasting cutting tool.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts quick and smooth.I can't be happier with this time saving tool.A must have for installing fence in concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Noll

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bit. Perfect hole very little dust compared to an auger bit which is what I came up in the trade using. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dave Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting tool.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and cuts great.Makes my job a lot easier.Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Noll

customer_reviews.title: and it cuts a nice clean hole
customer_reviews.text: Use just enough pressure to let the bit rotate, and it cuts a nice clean hole. Big enough to get an aluminum dryer duct through. Best price I found.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Seay

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. It arrived on time and was packaged well. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Louden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used them for years as a radon mitigator and they were completely reliable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Worthme

customer_reviews.title: Bosch is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Best core bit on the market! The size is perfect for tighter locations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used it, worked great, it was so nice...someone stole it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. 4" 24 ga pipe fit and cut like ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. 4" 24 ga pipe fit and cut like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bosch HC8531 3-1/4 In. x 12 In. SDS-max Rotary Hammer Core Bit
product_meta.description:
Size:3-1/4-InchBosch SDS-max carbide-tipped rotary hammer core bits offer an integral shank for better power transmission. Bosch SDS-max rotary hammer core bits with wave design go beyond the range of standard bits and allow smaller hammers to drill larger holes. Wave design transfers energy to bit more effectively for up to 40 percent faster drilling versus previous design.

AMAZON.COM
Core bits with wave design go beyond the range of standard bits and allow smaller hammers to drill larger holes. Bosch SDS-Max rotary hammer core bits are carbide tipped with an integral shank for better power transmission. Maximum core size is 2-5/8-inch deep.
feature_bullets: Wave design transfers energy to bit more effectively for up to 40 percent faster drilling versus previous design
Asymmetrical carbide teeth for faster cutting, longer life
All-in-one core transmits power directly to the end of the bit
Maximum core size is 2-5/8 In. deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars14 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
